name: Theoretical Neuroscience
description: A seminar covering topics in the theory of neural information processing, focused on perception, movement, learning and memory. Through reading, discussion and working with computer models students will learn fundamental concepts underlying current theories of brain function including information theory, spike-time/rate coding, population codes, deep learning architectures, liquid state-machines and Bayesian optimality.Same as NROD08H3
prerequisites: [NROC34H3 or NROC64H3 or NROC69H3] and [MATA29H3 or MATA31H3] and [PSYB07H3 or STAB22H3]
